object.description:
A magic crate containing gadgets from far and wide across the Realm. Open it to get one of the following:

*Kiritsukeru
*Watarimono
*Reinforced Root Armor
*Traveler's Trinket
*Mini Discoverer Samurai Skin
*Char Slot Unlocker
*Vault Chest Unlocker
*Ambrosia
*Mystery ST Shard x5
*Golden Clover

Sprite Credits: Lily

A crate stolen from within the Slurpian palace, found at the bottom of the ocean. Open it to get one of the following:

*Tideturner Trident
*Slurpian Sea Scroll
*Oceanic Apparel
*Imperial Keepsake
*Mini Slurp Scion Wizard Skin
*Char Slot Unlocker
*Vault Chest Unlocker
*Ambrosia
*Mystery ST Shard x5
*Golden Clover

Sprite Credits: TLMaelstrom

A crate which contains many magical items used for performance. Open it to get one of the following:

*Magic Wand
*Lightshow Scepter
*Magician's Robe
*Performer's Hat
*Mini Court Magician Sorcerer Skin
*Char Slot Unlocker
*Vault Chest Unlocker
*Ambrosia
*Mystery ST Shard x5
*Golden Clover

Sprite Credits: Sturky
A heavy iron blade set in a handle crafted from tough wood from the eastern tundras. Each slash carries immense amounts of force.
A blade made from iron stuck in firm dark oak. The raw power of each strike compensates for the blunt edge.
A breastplate crafted from sturdy plantlife and shards of iron. The plants seem to react when hit heavily.

effectinfo.description: +20 Vit for 4 seconds when hit for at least 40 damage.
effectinfo.name: When wearing "Traveler's Trinket"

object.description: A handy compass that reminds travelers of the homes they will someday return to.
A decorated forked weapon which can influence and control water, sending torrential downpours of calamity at aggressors.
An enchanted parchment, written in the Slurpian dialect. Its magic commands the tides, allowing one to propel their own movement.
Woven together from the silk of the oceanic Deepstriders, this robe is completely resistant to the tides of the ocean. Such garments are commonplace for royal Slurp attire.
As a memento of their kingdom, royal slurps are given one of these sacred pearls when adventuring out into the world.
The classic kit of a magician, built to both dazzle and destroy one's enemies.
This enchanted cane adds pizzazz to any battle! The cleverly engineered lighting effects inside become stronger for a bigger audience.
Filled with all the necessary tools of showmanship, this dapper robe is a must-have for any true magician.
A classy top hat known to have all manner of surprises in store, including rabbits, of course.

effectinfo.description: 20% chance to spawn a decoy rabbit for five seconds.
effectinfo.name: On Taking Damage

effectinfo.description: 20% chance to spawn a dove to aid you in combat for five seconds.
effectinfo.name: On Taking Damage

effectinfo.description: 200 damage every 0.5 seconds, within five tiles.
effectinfo.name: Dove Combat

object.description: A catastrophic spell of holy destruction, concocted in secrecy by the Liturgical Ones in their quest to learn a single letter of the divine language.
A tome beatified in starlight and written on paper from the ancient wisdom trees, cloaking the worthy in divine reverence.
A sun iron quiver passed through a royal elven lineage, whose legendary skills in archery have protected the forest kingdoms for millennia.
A moonwoven cloak worn by slayer cults who spill the blood of emperors in their abhorrent mission to create a new order.
An ashen helm of regal grandeur, whose wearers have upraised the greatest legions and inspired total domination.
A mighty shield smithed in the burning rivers of the demonic realms to grant the right of sovereignty over the brutal Orclands.
A jubilant seal of celebration, granted to the most righteous crusaders as they challenge the evergrowing threat of demonic legions.
The oceanic Necrofish's highly noxious poisons, secreted from its spines to befoul entire swaths of the seas.
A horrendously debauched martyr's skull that has been brought to ruin by foul enchantments of the sulfurous realms.
An explosive ocean trap constructed to tear open the ironhide of the abyssal deepworm.
An anomalous orb utilized by the astralmancers to banish demons who rose against them into a timeless void.
A scintillating prism of duplicity, infiltrating the deepest corners of the mind to awaken phantasmic entities that embody hatred and fear.
An azure scepter of elemental dominion, wielded by the sky charioteers to command the natural order of the overlands and the orchestration of astral bodies.
A heraldic shuriken of the ancient royal family, revered for its astonishingly lethal edge after generations of use by a mighty eastern empire.
A pristine wakizashi exalted by the archangels themselves and awarded to combatants with the most pure hearts.
A sacred spell of both order and annihilation, accumulating ancient energies to fabricate a macrocosmic system and destroy it in the blink of an eye.
A wondrous tome of the seraphic scribesmen to record the deeds of noble heroes and lend them their immortality.
A treasured arboreal quiver wielded by heralds of the Earth Goddess. It fires arrows of sacred life energy which smite corruption and darkness.
An ancient duskcloak that shifts in and out of existence, swaddling its wearer in an all-consuming nothingness.
A direhelm worn by the champions of men in their steadfast conquest of realms beyond even death.
An indestructible shield crafted by the earthgiants, bearing a long history of destruction and strife by entire nations who wish to claim it.
A crimson seal that is granted phenomenal power through the spilled blood of martyrs who fought for the welfare of all mankind.
Horrific toxins taken from the fangs of the plutonian Grimhydra, diluted with lesser poisons to make it possible for mortals to handle.
The long revered skull of the papacy, faceted over many centuries to devour holy light and lead a conquest of darkness.
An enormously dangerous trap engineered by blastsmith dwarves to annihilate the magma dragons that threaten their underkingdoms.
An unstable darkquartz orb used by reality-bending warlocks to tear open holes in existence and lock away enemies of the gods.
A brilliant moonjade prism cut from a forsaken jewel that corrupts the consciousness and imprints psychopathic monsters in the feebleminded.
A vermillion scepter of the heavenly sovereign, utilized in the formation of the mortal realms by cleaving the infinite aether into a tremendous starstorm.
A marvelous treasure and destructive weapon that embodies the cardinal duality of light and dark.
A flawless diamond gifted as a symbol of gratitude from the shogunate and regarded among the finest blades ever constructed.
A magical lute that inspires allies.
A sturdy lute made of finely cut oakwood.
A special lute given to apprentice musicians to compose their finest ballads.
A polished lute built for combat against undead menaces.
A lightweight lute designed to project strong sounds across the chaos of battlefields.
An immaculate lute granted to the appointed bards of wealthy rulers as their travel companions.
A misty lute created by the exalted songweavers in their task to awaken the wind deity Shu.
A mysterious lute of dark matter, capable of playing joyous songs even in the oppressive sound void of space.
A fiery lute consumed in scorching heat, whose sounds inspire hope among grief for the anguished souls bound to eternal perdition.
A delightful instrument played among the serene choirs of saintly singers in the hallowed realms above.
A resplendent trumpet used to signify the coming of the end times, prophesied to sound their most glorious note at the opening of the seventh seal.

effectinfo.description: Increases your attack by 8 for 4 secs
effectinfo.name: Harp

effectinfo.description: Increases your defense by 12 for 4 secs
effectinfo.name: Wings

object.description: A breathtaking pair of delicate white wings used by the empyrean seraphim to reach the highest peaks of the heavens.
A ring of light bestowed upon the virtuous as a divine symbol of their consecration.
A rather peculiar instrument played by the sailors of the seven seas. Its music has the unique property of attracting parrots that will obey the musician's every command.

effectinfo.description: Throws a fighting parrot at your target
effectinfo.name: Parrot Cannon

effectinfo.description: 5% chance upon shooting for a fighting parrot to protect you for 3 seconds
effectinfo.name: Feather Frenzy

object.description: A ceremonial pungi that contains the spirits of fifteen snakes, guiding the righteous through their many paths ahead.
An unusually crafted lute with an ancient style of construction, meant to produce soothing sounds of deep sleep and keep wrathful gods dormant.

effectinfo.description: Summons a Pharaoh's mask on the cursors location that inflicts Weak for 3 secs within 3 sqrs every 1 sec
effectinfo.name: Pharaoh's Wrath

effectinfo.description: Upon taking at least 50 damage, protects you with Armored on Self for 3 secs. Inflicts Weak on enemies for 5 secs within 5 sqrs
effectinfo.name: Pharaoh's Ward

object.description: An imposing golden trophy smelted from the crumbled remains of a demonic idol and personally molded by Archdemon Malphas. The few who are capable of holding it for themselves are said to be filled with immense vigor.
First assembled as a combat modification to Treasurer Gemsbok's gilded scepter, this artifact consumes substantial magical energy to detonate a chaotic blast.

effectinfo.description: Release a nova of dazing 200 damage shots across 3.5 tiles
effectinfo.name: Mad God's Wrath

object.description: Oryx's unseen strikers wield these serrated claws for precise and deadly slashes to make an example out of the Mad God's most hated adversaries.

effectinfo.description: 33% chance to boost attack or dexterity by 15 for 3 seconds.
effectinfo.name: Killer Instinct
Shots
effectinfo.description: 6 slashes from the sides of the player

object.description: All but Chancellor Dammah's own mages shun this blasphemous spell, channeling the dark energies of the earth to construct an explosive spike.

effectinfo.description: 50% chance to boost defense by 15 for 3 seconds.
effectinfo.name: Mayhem Aegis

object.description: A sacred blade forged by the ancient worshippers of the sun god. Though now corrupted under Oryx's rule, its unique craftsmanship still showcases its ability to focus a strike upon a single point.
An alluring entanglement forged with razor-like black iron. Oryx's most adept hunters use this device to severely wound their prey before executing them.

effectinfo.description: 50% chance to wound enemies ensnared within five seconds, dealing 750 damage over three seconds.
effectinfo.name: Lasting Damage

object.description: The charred remains of an ancient demon ruler once killed by the Mad God. Oryx's wicked spellcasters have cursed it with the ability to resurrect and control demons.

effectinfo.description: 70% chance to summon an undead demon minion
effectinfo.name: Dark Ritual

object.description: This prism's light-storing ability makes it essential equipment for Oryx's recon squad, granting them unmatched efficiency in any scenario.

effectinfo.description: +15 attack for 4 seconds when used above 450 HP
effectinfo.name: Upper Hand

effectinfo.description: Invisible for 6 seconds when used below 450 HP
effectinfo.name: Tactical Retreat

object.description: An accursed collection of religious texts detailing the Mad God's rise to power, granted to Oryx's high priests by Archbishop Leucoryx as a symbol of utmost trust.

effectinfo.description: Creates a healing Holy Orb when used below 80% HP
effectinfo.name: Light Energy

effectinfo.description: Creates a damaging Darkness Orb when used above 80% HP
effectinfo.name: Dark Energy

object.description: A firm cloak worn by Oryx's stealth agents to assist in quiet takedowns. It doubles as protection for any compromised situation.

effectinfo.description: +100 Max HP for 4.5 seconds when used above 550 HP
effectinfo.name: Strike Precautions

effectinfo.description: Restore 20 HP when hit while invisible above 550 HP
effectinfo.name: Stealth Guard

effectinfo.description: Restore 80 HP when hit while invisible below 550 HP
effectinfo.name: Emergency Ration

effectinfo.description: Constructs a beacon that damages and curses enemies in three bursts.
effectinfo.name: Beacon of Blight

effectinfo.description: Curses for 1 seconds and inflicts 400 damage within 5 squares
effectinfo.name: First Explosion

effectinfo.description: Curses for 3 seconds and inflicts 500 damage within 4 squares
effectinfo.name: Second Explosion

effectinfo.description: Curses for 5 seconds and inflicts 600 damage within 3 squares
effectinfo.name: Third Explosion

effectinfo.description: Increase your attack by 10 for 5 seconds.
effectinfo.name: Conquerer's Energy

object.description: Oryx's sentries use these cursed orbs as their watchful eyes, maintaining and enforcing the Mad God's constant rule across the realm.
Chief Beisa personally made this decorated horn to produce a deep, booming sound, rallying troops and sending signals to coordinate unrelenting assaults.

effectinfo.description: Apply Slowed for 4 seconds to enemies within 4 squares
effectinfo.name: Deafening Blast

effectinfo.description: Place down a banner for 5 seconds that applies Berserk to allies within 4 squares.
effectinfo.name: On Use

effectinfo.description: When below 50% HP, Armored on self for 2 seconds.
effectinfo.name: Stagger

effectinfo.description: When above 50% HP, increases attack by 150 for 0.6 seconds.
effectinfo.name: Counter

object.description: Given to Oryx's most esteemed gladiators, this twisted artifact is capable of focusing all of the wearer's strength into a single blow, mirroring the Mad God's own fighting style.
A helm forged in the deepest depths of Oryx's realm. Those who wear it are said to feel a dark power coursing through their veins.

effectinfo.name: Battle Cry
effectinfo.description: Deals a burst of 1000 damage to enemies within 5 sqrs on use.

object.description: In contrast to Oryx's personal equipment, this lightweight shield is too small to stagger an opponent. It is instead covered in jagged metal to shred targets.

effectinfo.name: Full Strength
effectinfo.description: Shoots additional radial projectiles with a longer range when used above 80% HP.

object.description: Oryx's most versatile bowmen receive javelin training, requiring a steady hand and perfect focus to inflict devastating damage.

effectinfo.description: 33% chance of increasing attack by a further 10
effectinfo.name: Mental Click

object.description: Oryx demanded his alchemists make a poison capable of killing more rapidly to satisfy his impatience. The resulting brew proved rather explosive.

effectinfo.name: Cluster Bomb
effectinfo.description: Initial poison bomb creates 3 cluster bombs 1.5 tiles from its center.

object.description: A glistening droplet of the god's nectar.\n\nSprite Credits: Aurum
Your secret weapon against the monsters in the realm.\n\nSprite Credits: Seelpit
A sip of this will make you feel like a real god.
The pride of Treasurer Gemsbok, this gilded knife has backstabbed countless traders in shady dealings.
A coin pilfered from the endless vault of Gemsbok's hoarded wealth. Only the most daring would stake their lives on the equal odds of a coin flip.

effectinfo.name: On Ability Use
effectinfo.description: Summons a Gold Coin that acts as a decoy. Each second it has a 50% chance to become silver or continue to exist.

effectinfo.name: Silver Coin
effectinfo.description: Acts as a decoy. Each second it has a 50% chance to disappear or continue to exist.

object.description: This covering is assigned to Oryx's negotiators to conceal weaponry and get away with stolen fortunes.
Treasurer Gemsbok had this monocle custom made to enhance his perception in stealth strikes.

effectinfo.name: On Shoot
effectinfo.description: Boosts attack by 12 for 4 second if the user is Invisible

object.description: This ceremonial mace controls the forces of light and darkness. Archbishop Leucoryx uses it for distinguished offerings in the name of his god.
The sacred writings of Leucoryx and his disciples, compiled as a tribute to Oryx to lend false credence to the teachings of his twisted followers.

effectinfo.name: On Ability Activate
effectinfo.description: Summons a Chaos Beam on your cursor, striking instantly for 1800-2200 armor piercing damage in a 2.5 square radius.

effectinfo.name: On Ability Use
effectinfo.description: Boosts attack by 15 and decreases defense by 6 for 5 seconds

object.description: This cursed robe overwhelms the wearer with conflicting thoughts of good and evil, shattering the will of the weak-minded.
A majestic crown of the venerated, bestowed upon Archbishop Leucoryx to solidify his position in Oryx's legion.
This aptly named staff is the manifestation of Chancellor Dammah's assertions of grandeur. Although he seldom uses it for actual combat purposes, it is no less potent as a legitimate weapon.

Dammah's powers of summoning portals stem from this profane spell. Most may use it to call attacks from primitive dimensions of untapped energy, but Oryx's greatest thaumaturges can create stable gateways to the realm and beyond.

effectinfo.name: On Ability Use
effectinfo.description: Summons 4 portals which zap enemies and deal 250 damage in a radius of 6 every 0.4 seconds

object.description: The diplomacy of Chancellor Dammah goes as far as his limited patience. The true purpose of this robe is its deeply woven enchantment to bolster arcane powers.

effectinfo.name: On Taking Damage
effectinfo.description: Shots above 50 damage summon a portal which deals 250 damage and zaps enemies in a radius of 5 every 0.4 seconds

object.description: The warped mind of Oryx's appointed chancellor. This cursed object thrives in the presence of demented energies.

effectinfo.name: On Taking Damage
effectinfo.description: Shots above 50 damage summon a following cranium which deals 150 damage every 0.2 seconds for 5 seconds and zaps enemies in a radius of 6

object.description: Chief Beisa designed and forged this sawtoothed blade himself to be granted admission as a gladiator. Its shattering strikes are amplified by his own slashing techniques.
To dominate the battlefield, Beisa's assault units possess this star model to remain vigorous in combat before controlling zones with its independent throwing arcs.

effectinfo.description: Throws an additional 4 parametric stars at half the range which inflict Stunned on enemies for 3 seconds
effectinfo.name: Inner Circle

object.description: Specially weighted plates layered inside this armor channel greater force into every motion of the body for destructive blows.

effectinfo.name: On Shoot
effectinfo.description: Increases attack by 12 for 4.5 seconds if the user has the Healing status effect

object.description: The battle standard of Beisa's forces, a sign of triumph for Oryx and calamity for those he faces.

effectinfo.name: On Ability Use
effectinfo.description: Summons a banner which deals 400-600 damage each second within 6 tiles and grants Damaging to players within 3 tiles.

object.description: The chosen blade of Oryx the Mad God, charged with an unrelenting energy to subdue all that lies before it.

effectinfo.name: Exalted Beam
effectinfo.description: Deals 600-800 damage in a 2.25 square radius, scaling with your Attack and Status Effects

effectinfo.name: Beam Range
effectinfo.description: Instantly strikes 4 tiles away in the direction of your attack

object.description: An enormous shield decorated with the crest of Oryx, an infamous symbol of oppression dreaded across the realm.

effectinfo.name: On Ability Use
effectinfo.description: Summons three consecutive Exalted Beams that each deal 1000-1200 damage in a 2.75 square radius, inflicting Stunned for 2 seconds

object.description: Although refurbished, this breastplate is the very same Oryx received as a gift from the royal family in celebration of his gladiatorial prowess.
A horn claimed from Oryx's iconic helmet. To hold this in one's hand is a monumental insult to the Mad God's ego.

effectinfo.name: Mad God's Hubris
effectinfo.description: Gain +10 dexterity while attacking if your health is above 90% Max HP

object.description: An illuminated elixir of divine energy, regenerating its contents to never fully deplete.
A medallion infused with the essence of the Sandstone Titan.

effectinfo.description: Obtained by defeating the Sandstone Titan in the Ancient Ruins
effectinfo.name: Drop location

object.description: This sword's blade is infused with magical essence, causing it to fire out violently upon lunging. That same magical force pulls the blade back to its hilt after striking.

Created to guide the spirits of the desert, this seal has infused itself with their energy over many years. This spiritual energy affects living creatures in unconventional ways compared to normal practices.
Decorated with ancient amber, this helmet's idle solitude over many years have caused its abilities to dwindle.
Refreshing water from within a desert cactus. Good for quenching thirst, but infamous for its unpredictable effects on one's mind.
A prickly bow with unshaven thorns jutting out from the grip, making it unwieldy to fire.
A silky case of arrows woven by Mama Megamoth's larvae for use by her woodland warriors.

A crate which contains an assortment of exotic goods for famous treasure hunters. Open it to get one of the following:

*Resplendent Bow
*Embellished Quiver
*Ornate Armor
*Aquamarine Amulet
*Mini Treasure Hunter Archer Skin
*Char Slot Unlocker
*Vault Chest Unlocker
*Ambrosia
*Mystery ST Shard x5
*Golden Clover

Sprite Credits: Aurum

A crate which contains the wicked equipment of dark practitioners. Open it to get one of the following:

*Soulcursed Scythe
*Vampiric Cape
*Hallowed Hide
*Ruthven's Rosary
*Mini Vampire Rogue Skin
*Char Slot Unlocker
*Vault Chest Unlocker
*Ambrosia
*Mystery ST Shard x5
*Golden Clover
A two-faced blade enchanted with the wicked power of immortal beings.
A dark and flowing cape donned by masters of the twilight hours.

effectinfo.description: +10 DEX on ability use for 4 seconds
effectinfo.name: With Soulcursed Scythe

object.description: The hide of a false creature given sentience by profane life-twisting magic, forever cursed as an affront to the laws of mortal life.

effectinfo.description: Healing on self for 5 seconds when hit below 50% max HP
effectinfo.name: With Ruthven's Rosary

object.description: A ruby-beaded necklace, carried by the cadaverous followers of Lord Ruthven.
I courageously descended into the ruins, only to be bombarded with cactus spines as sharp as arrows.
After fending off men made of clay, I discovered a lamp that might fetch a considerable sum at the market.

effectinfo.description: Fire 3 projectiles in a line with the closest inflicting Paralyzed and the middle inflicting Slowed
effectinfo.name: Effect

effectinfo.description: Fire an additional two lines of projectiles
effectinfo.name: With Aquamarine Amulet

object.description: To my shock, a spirit arose from the lamp and thanked me for freeing him. The Genie would only allow me access to the contents of the lamp if I proved myself against his vast spiritual power.
Though his magic was strong, my resolve was stronger. The spirit dissipated and all that remained was the treasure within.
The precision skills of archery translate well to pulling a trigger.\n\nSprite Credits: Zquidx, Geo
Lay down the foundation of your enemy's demise!\n\nSprite Credits: Trensient, Geo
Just as essential in the field of construction as it is on the field of battle!\n\nSprite Credits: Zquidx, Geo
Measure twice, because you'll only need to cut once.\n\nSprite Credits: Trensient, Geo
Cannot banish people from this realm like certain other hammers, but it's plenty strong enough to get a job done.\n\nSprite Credits: Zquidx, Geo
Force your foes to buzz off with this sharpened tool!\n\nSprite Credits: Mizumi, Zquidx, Geo
High-visibility equipment for workers on the front lines of construction. The ventilated cloth helps keep the wearer lively and vigorous in demanding circumstances.\n\nSprite Credits: Mizumi

A rugged hard hat worn by stalwart workers in the name of reconstruction.\n\nSprite Credits: Trensient

object.description: A sturdy hard hat worn by steadfast pioneers to bring the realm's territories up to code. Wear it with pride!\n\nSprite Credits: Trensient

effectinfo.description: +10 DEF for 5 seconds when In Combat

Exchange this item for a construction armor of choice at the Tinkerer!\n\nSprite Credits: Zquidx
Exchange this item for a construction skin of choice at the Tinkerer!\n\nSprite Credits: Mizumi
Open the goodie bag to get a reward!\n\nSprite Credits: Mizumi
Only a spoonful.

effectinfo.description: 10% chance upon shooting to drop a food item on the ground.
effectinfo.name: Sloppy Eater

effectinfo.description: Gain healing for 3 seconds and heal for 50HP
effectinfo.name: Muscle Milk

effectinfo.description: Gain energized for 3 seconds and heal for 25HP
effectinfo.name: Sugar Rush

effectinfo.description: Gain damaging for 3 seconds and heal for 25HP
effectinfo.name: Well fed

object.description: Work smarter not harder.
A pristine garb worn by only the most professional of chefs.
The Apetizers prized toque which shows his expertise in a variety of different cooking techniques.
Firing from this quiver uniquely applies the force of the bowstring as potential energy, which is then overcharged and converted to kinetic energy for a delayed, yet intensely powerful release.

effectinfo.description: Leaves behind a trail of 4 additional slowing projectiles after accelerating
effectinfo.name: Effect

object.description: The arrows of this grotesque bow are laced with an inverted energy, causing shots to lose velocity and create brief barriers.
Dr. Terrible modeled this staff in the likeness of his creation as an experimental attachment to the M.E.R.V. design. To prevent overheating, the unstable energy discharges require a moment to cool.
The gouged eye of the ferocious F.E.R.A.L. It is no longer potent enough to generate energy beams, but the beast's psychic vision still instinctively lashes back at aggressors.
The swirling swings of this scythe can slice through bone as if it were a feeble stalk.\n\nSprite Credits: TLMaelstrom
A skull haunted by the chilling breath of a reanimated killer. The number 66 is strangely carved on one side.\n\nSprite Credits: TLMaelstrom
A dark robe used to conceal the skeletal body of the specter of death.\n\nSprite Credits: TLMaelstrom
Drinking the blood within is said to separate one's soul from their flesh, becoming an eternal disciple of the afterlife.\n\nSprite Credits: TLMaelstrom
Grants a random Halloween ST item when used!\n\nSprite Credits: Aurum
This garment will add a new quick slot for your consumables!
The Mad God's likeness has been finely forged into this prestigious medal for acclaimed minions.\n\nSprite Credits: Aurum
The massive ruby set in this weighty ring is believed to control and harness the wearer's rage.\n\nSprite Credits: Aurum
Oryx ordered the careful construction of this charm in hopes of mimicking the unique life-altering powers of a legendary amulet lost to the ages.\n\nSprite Credits: Aurum
Trim up the tree with Oryxmas stuff, like mistletoe and big cream puffs!
All who stand against the merry melodies of the holiday season will be jingle bell ROCKED.
The hot wax of this candle burns with the judgement of those who lack a giving spirit.
This festive axe is meant to chop wood for a cozy winter fireplace, but it could probably handle your enemies in combat too.
Candy canes, candy canes, lick them in a spear and kill your enemies!
Great for stringing along doors, railings, or the nock of an arrow before releasing.
Exchange this item for an Oryxmas weapon of choice at the Tinkerer!
A golden voice can inspire as much as any instrument.
A cube of jelly held together by a thin film. It has regenerative properties, but temporarily suppresses the consumer's magic.
A medallion infused with the essence of the Tesseract Goddess.

effectinfo.description: Obtained by defeating the Tesseract Goddess in the Third Dimension

object.description: An angular wakizashi crafted from the core of the Shadow Cube God. In spite of the narrow blade, it can unleash quite a devastating onslaught.

object.description: A seal granting the user access to other dimensions, though the means by which this is accomplished are unknown.

effectinfo.description: Leaves bursts of damage in your wake

object.description: These garbs aren't fitted for humans, making them quite uncomfortable. However, the protective properties it bestows upon the wearer are invaluable.

object.description: Fitted with a cube shaped crystal, this band is capable of mitigating harm to the wearer.

Elite Viking warriors and guards were given these great battle axes to use in combat. The mighty Dalvar, strongest of all the Vikings, was known to cut through enemy defenses with this finely balanced weapon.

Recovered from the wreckage of a Viking ship, this large buckler can strike unlike any other shield. It can sustain the force of its strike in the air itself, uniquely constructed to mimic the Viking tale of Thielief the Steadfast catching a relic suspended in the air during a raid of saintly territory.

Painstakingly forged through an immeasurable amount of iron rings linked together, this armor allows its wearer to remain more agile and flexible than traditional armors. The speed rivals that of the legendary Viking Diggsun, whose tide-turning charge on the edge of the battlefield won a great war.
A ceremonial horn gifted to the Vikings from their ancient gods. Blowing it is said to temporarily bestow to the owner the power of Odin, known by some northern clans as Zimmer.

effectinfo.description: Armored for 5 seconds if below 33% health
effectinfo.name: On Shoot

effectinfo.description: Berserk for 4 seconds on ability use
effectinfo.name: With Dalvar's Battle Axe

object.description: This formerly ordinary mace was twisted by Arachna's son after plucking it from a hapless victim. Though he has no reason to use it himself, some believe the Son of Arancha keeps it as reminder to his kin to not cross him as he did his mother.
The guiding power of the realm's pollenating drones. Even when stolen from their proper queen, it can still briefly influence their minds to service.

Easter celebrations call for eggs, but Oryx's strict regulations on anything that might be a chicken makes eggs risky. This mace mimics the functions of an egg to summon pre-grown rabbits, with exactly the personality you'd expect from an animal raised by a weapon.

effectinfo.name: Summons

object.description: A highly versatile tool modified from what was once just a vial holder. It can extend and retract, tighten for wrench functions, and shoot energy blasts. All the usual tools of science!

object.description: Not to be confused with a more traditional lab coat, this robe is steeped in chemicals to protect from radiation. This same substance surrounds the labratory's protective A.E.G.I.S. system.
This feat of technology enables approved users to control all primary functions of the lab facility and access otherwise encrypted data.
A wicked mace constructed by Dr. Terrible to impose the Mad God's will. It stands as one of Oryx's greatest attempts at merging magic and technology.
Small particles of energy visibly buzz around inside the glistening crystals of this mace.

object.description: A soothing crescent-shaped instrument known to relax one's body and mind when played, lowering their guard and making onesself drowsy. Only its player can hear the quiet melodies, sure to have them counting sheep in no time.
Contains information about saying hi to the world.

activate.title: Hello World
activate.text:
Lorem Ipsum This is text. 
This is a great text with great words. In the future it will be used to give players information and lore details. Did you know that Lorem Ipsum is latin? Probably yes, you'd have to live under a rock to not know it.
 Actually, this text is longer in purpose. 
It also contains numerals like 0123456789.

object.description: Contains information about a long forgotten game, practiced by the masterminds of the Ancient Era.

activate.title: Forgotten Chess
activate.text:
{color=#30364d}How to play{/color}
Simply say the name of a piece, then stand on top of it to select it!
Say another piece's name if you change your mind, or 'cancel' if the piece was already selected.
Checkmate, Stalemate and Threefold Repetition aren't checked.
You must manage this yourself by saying 'Draw', 'Resign' or 'Checkmate' to propose it.
Both players must agree for a proposal to succeed!

object.description: Contains information about a long forgotten game, practiced by the masterminds of the Ancient Era.

activate.title: Forgotten Backgammon
activate.text:
{color=#30364d}How to play{/color}
Simply say 'roll' to roll the dice.
The pieces will move automatically based on the result of the dice.
Say 'Resign' if you want to abandon or 'Bet' if you want to create/raise a bet against your opponent.

object.description: Contains information about a long forgotten game, practiced by the masterminds of the Ancient Era.

activate.title: Forgotten Arcade
activate.text:
{color=#30364d}How to play{/color}
Simply say 'Start' to start the arcade.
Try to move horizontally to make the spaceship to move along the horizontal axis, following you.
You need to stay within the colored line to remain control of the ship!
 The ship automatically fires if there's an UFO in front of it, but different UFO types may require a certain number of hits.
You lose if any UFO reaches the last line!
Say 'Resign' if you want to leave the game. Your score will be memorized during the duration of the Arcade Event.

object.description: Chronicles of mysterious events that might be important for the fate of the realm.

Contract Number: N/A
Special Instructions: Skip inspection procedure and depart immediately. Go at full sail and return to Deadwater Docks quickly after unloading.

Order: Two (2) barrels of parrot crackers
Departing Location: Mainland (southeast peninsula)
Destination: Deadwater Docks
Shipment Vessel: The Alexander
Contract Number: 8848
Special Instructions: To be accompanied by any available frigates, high priority.

object.description: Chronicles of mysterious events that might be important for the fate of the realm.

activate.title: Shipping Log (Exports)
activate.text:
Order: Twenty (20) cases of rum
Departing Location: Deadwater Docks
Destination: Beachzone
Shipment Vessel: The Barnacle of Tortuga
Contract Number: 5703
Special Instructions: N/A

Order: Eight (8) cases of rum
Departing Location: Deadwater Docks
Destination: ...
Shipment Vessel: Pride of Cronus
Contract Number: 6736
Special Instructions: Meet recipient behind the customs house

Order: 3.5 million (3,500,000) grains of gunpowder
Departing Location: Deadwater Docks
Destination: Unaddressed home in upper highlands
Shipment Vessel: Royal Sovereign
Contract Number: 6899
Special Instructions: Rendezvous with HMS Fearless prior, do not converse with recipient.

Departing Location: Deadwater Docks

Special Instructions: Dump shipment into the sea when in view, and make sure he sees you this time first!

object.description: Unlocks new items in the Item Forge. Also, one Blueprint can be dismantled for some Forgefire reduction.

Biff asked the Appetizer for it many times. In the end, he didn't like it.\n\nSprite Credits: Maggiemagi

An old tale speaks of an ancient alchemist named Mortimer, it is said that he only ate potatoes and only drank energy drinks. He slowly went mad and started worshiping potatoes. Eventually he sought to combine the two items he consumed and created this. The potato is surprisingly potent, despite being a bit....soggy.\n\nSprite Credits: Sues
There is nothing quite like fresh pastry.\n\nSprite Credits: Maggiemagi
Actually a pastry made to resemble a roast rabbit, Biff uses this dish as a prank to his guests.\n\nSprite Credits: Maggiemagi
It's a mystery. Maybe the Tinkerer will know what to do with it.
Summons an ally cat!
A page from a greater collection of some historical record, depicting a familiar civilization in its prime.
A page from a greater collection of some historical record, depicting an ungovernable rise to power.
A page from a greater collection of some historical record, depicting a persuaded decision which changed the fate of a kingdom.
A page from a greater collection of some historical record, depicting the husk of a formerly grand civilization.
The pride of the shattered kingdom, restored to a point where it can truly be called such. Even beholding its former glory cannot cover the ominous reality behind it.
A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Former Glory
activate.text:
Hail to our land of providence strong
A home to all heritage and trades
Hail to the allies who join us in song
May the realm never need to draw blades

Hail to the rulers of benevolent kind
Their wisdom through all lands renowned
And hail to the kingdom of faultless design
Shall it evermore serve the crowned

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: The Royal Guard
activate.text: {color=#153b2e}My King, the royal guard is already shining with the strength of the kingdom itself! Soon they too will be without equal.{/color}\n\n{color=#442554}Splendid! But tell me...{/color}

object.displayid: Page III: Knight of the People
object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Knight of the People
activate.text: {color=#442554}Just who is HE?{/color}

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: The Right Stuff
activate.text: {color=#153b2e}Oryx, my Lord. He hails from our own people, and in his short time has already demonstrated great skill. As a commoner, our recruiters nearly turned him away...\n\n...had he not beaten his assessment instructor at the first mention of rejection.{/color}

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Honor and Might

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: First Among Equals
activate.text: {color=#442554}That desire to achieve inspires the people of this kingdom to know our eminence...{/color}

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Oryx the Merciful
activate.text: {color=#442554}It inspires fellow warriors to fight against any odds...{/color}

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: True Potential
activate.text: {color=#442554}And in truth, it should even inspire our aggressors to know and fear our glory.{/color}

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: The Wrong Stuff
activate.text: {color=#442554}One such as him will never be satisfied. No, true greatness always seeks more. And that is precisely what will make him more than a champion for the kingdom, but a conqueror.{/color}

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Turning the Tables
activate.text: {color=#442554}No, this... this cannot be...!{/color}

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Jealousy

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Regret

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Loyalty

object.displayid: Page XIV: Point of No Return
object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...
A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Drastic Measures
activate.text: {color=#442554}Ha... ha... haha{/color}{color=#483452}haha{/color}\n\n{color=#3c3940}HAHAA!{/color}

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Present Shame
activate.text: {i}The gloomy and abandoned ruins, enveloped by twilight, are now the shelter of the shadows...{/i}

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Hollow
activate.text: {i}Once a legendary kingdom, its walls are broken, its dwellers are forgotten.{/i}

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Minds and Magic
activate.text: {i}No living souls have entered these grounds, no noble creatures have stepped into it.{/i}

object.displayid: Page XIX: A Bridge Too Far
object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: A Bridge Too Far
activate.text: {i}The immense kingdom has fallen, its sentinels have turned to dust.{/i}

object.description: A small part of an ancient volume...

activate.title: Royal Consequences
activate.text:
{i}No one remembers its name, and no one will.

It's called the Ruins...

...the Grave...

{color=#3c3940}The Shatters.{/color}{/i}

This cryptic blade has been forged from beligerent energies of the great beyond. Wielding it twists mortal comprehension of right and wrong.
A mystifying sigil from an otherwordly domain. The power sealed within causes it to faintly pull at its surroundings, attempting to draw them into the void.

effectinfo.description: Summon a void rift for 5 seconds

effectinfo.name: Rift effect
effectinfo.description: Curses enemies and deals 150-200 damage within 4.5 sqrs every 0.4 seconds

object.description: The individual plates of this armor shift constantly in and out of realms under the Void's influence. The few mortals that have found, let alone are able to wear this cursed armor become entranced in protective and destructive forces.
Though lacking physical form, this trinket grants a sense of sight that allows beings from the realm of shadow to peer into the worlds bathed in light.
The eldest of Daeva warriors crafted this sacred weapon to smite all that dare oppose the forces of the light.
A glorious artifact, bestowed upon mortals from Daeva warriors. Emulating their altruistic goals, this prism can forge countless fighters from the pure lights of the heavens.

effectinfo.description: Each piece of the set provides a unique attribute to the Decoy
effectinfo.name: Divine Blessing

object.description: These garments have been meticulously crafted over the millennia to serve the Daeva, helping them ward off and fight against the ever burning forces of darkness.
A mere flame from the legendary forgefire used by Daeva master crafters, this trinket grants awe-inspiring powers to those deemed worthy.

effectinfo.description: Release a ring of fire when In Combat
effectinfo.name: On Shoot

object.description:
An otherworldly crate whose contents appear formless, only manifesting when pried open. Open it to get one of the following:

*Fallen One's Blade
*Abyssal Insignia
*Vortex Plating
*Eye of the Void
*Mini Corrupted Paladin Skin
*Char Slot Unlocker
*Vault Chest Unlocker
*Ambrosia
*Mystery ST Shard x5
*Golden Clover

A holy crate assembled by an elusive angelic race seen with greater frequency in recent times. Open it to get one of the following:

*Archangel's Judgement
*Daevite Progenitor
*Seraphim's Guard
*Flames of Genesis
*Mini Daeva Trickster Skin
*Char Slot Unlocker
*Vault Chest Unlocker
*Ambrosia
*Mystery ST Shard x5
*Golden Clover
A vile weapon ablaze with the Void's malevolent intent.
A celestial bow that strikes as true as its wielder's heart is.
A staff that can only be wielded by those embodying both justice and power.
Brought forth by an intruder from the Void, this wand has a mind of its own.
A heavy blade wielded by the monstrous warriors of the Void.
An instrument of justice, enchanted in the clouds.
Crafted from the hide of an unspeakable horror.
Said to give power over the forces of the Void, at a price higher than most are willing to pay.
The shining armor worn by the winged Daeva warriors.
A burning shard hailing from the Void itself; the concentrated torment of lost souls.

effectinfo.name: On Taking Damage
effectinfo.description: When health drops below 75% spawns a void spirit who deals damage for 5 seconds

effectinfo.name: Void Spirit effect
effectinfo.description: Deals 100-150 armor piercing damage within 4.5 sqrs every 0.6 seconds. Click or hold your Summon Control button to move it

effectinfo.name: On Taking Damage
effectinfo.description: When health drops below 50% boost +10 ATT for 10 seconds

object.description: A small yet potent flame brought down from the heavens. It burns bright with the power of life.

effectinfo.name: On Taking Damage
effectinfo.description: When health drops below 50% spawns a healing spirit that heals for 5 seconds.

effectinfo.name: Healing Spirit effect
effectinfo.description: Heals up to 5 players within 5 tiles by 80 HP every second

effectinfo.name: On Taking Damage
effectinfo.description: When health drops below 75% boost +15 DEF for 10 seconds

object.description: A healthy, tree-shaped snack. Guaranteed to contain zero tree!
Cholesterol won't be an issue. Promise!
Full of potassium and only a little radioactive!
It is orange, round and full of nutrients.
Refreshing, but may give your pet brain freeze.
With the caloric power of a thousand suns!
A twisted concoction, created after imbuing the golden nectar of the gods with the power of the Void.
The very lifeblood of holiness.
Straight from the heavens, this drink may give your pet abilities in poetry.
Do not be alarmed by its toxic green color - Calbrik's grandma actually whipped it together from common herbs.
Definitely not poisonous. Actually mimics a poisonous mushroom. Trust it!
Yeah, it does taste a bit weird. Worth it, though!
A solution of the Void's concentrated power, this potent elixir may kill you... or make you stronger.
With its fresh, herbal taste, this sparkling potion invokes a feeling of euphoria and overwhelming confidence.
Grown in the clouds and fermented to make Ambrosia.

A veritable artifact from the forgotten splendor of a kingdom none wish to remember. No matter the craftsmanship of its gilded design, this unwelcome sight is now only a sobering reminder of a mistake without regret.
A dreadfully heavy barbute, prominently featuring inward curving horns. Such a trait has been considered taboo for eons, further marking the age of this design.

effectinfo.description: Fires a sword of projectiles towards your cursor.
effectinfo.name: Eternal Defender

object.description: Endless melodies from this fine instrument once filled the halls of the castle. It is without any apparent wear, yet even the most upbeat tune sounds somber when it is played.

effectinfo.description: On use, lowers your shot speed by half for 4 seconds.
effectinfo.name: Self Only

object.description: A perfectly concentrated blend of elemental forces, primed to diverge into an explosive result if the seal is ever broken. This flawless balance is believed to be the key to a still greater power.
Use of magical weapons is typically reserved for the king's mage units. For a swordsman to receive such a fine piece of craft was considered a great honor, and perhaps still is.

effectinfo.description: Fire 3 swords that pause and target the nearest enemy.
effectinfo.name: Effect

object.description: This deeply profaned magitech haunts those who bear it with distant, unending screams. One's conscience must be far beyond all reason to use its tremendous and varied powers without vacillation.

effectinfo.description: Your weapon fires two more bullets, each dealing 65-80 damage.
effectinfo.name: Effect

object.description: Exceedingly large and challenging to handle, this titanic blade embodies the stoic might of its true owner.

effectinfo.name: On Shoot
effectinfo.description: When in combat, reduces your attack by 10.

object.description: An untempered casting wand brought forth to tap into distant powers, but an imbalance rendered it too unreliable for most to dare use.

effectinfo.name: On Shoot
effectinfo.description: When in combat, silences you for 0.4 seconds.

object.description: Rarely brandished and in pristine condition, the old monarchy deemed this exquisite recurve too dignified for all but royalty to handle. Though it remains unproven in practical combat, this bow's raw potential is unmatched, waiting to be drawn out through pure focus.

effectinfo.name: On Shoot
effectinfo.description: When in combat, reduces your dexterity by 10.

object.description: The lavish robes of the kingdom's royalty, outfitted with pauldrons on both shoulders for a more distinguished appearance. A sinister presence remains channeled through the draping fabric.
Formerly a nobleman's uniform, now workshopped by the court magician into a gloomy coat befitting of his accursed company.

effectinfo.name: On Shoot
effectinfo.description: When in combat, gain Armored for 4 seconds.

object.description: Armor of the bridge sentinel, adorned with honors which now serve only as a bitter reminder of what once was.

effectinfo.name: On Shoot
effectinfo.description: When in combat, gain invulnerable for 2 seconds.

object.description: A small dose of a bitter-tasting remedy from the Shattered Kingdom. In a strange sense, it feels older than the kingdom itself.
Part of a sacramental rite, the memory of which has faded with those who observed its divine grace.
An ill-gained boon. Open it to reach into the Void.
A blessing not given freely. Open it to reach into the heavens.

True power is only available to those that have accepted all of its manifestations. To wield force that could affect the cosmic balance, one needs to forge their own equilibrium, tempered in the flames of strife.

effectinfo.name: On Ability Use
effectinfo.description: Summons a Duality creature that heals up to 10 players for 200 HP once and then applies healing to surrounding players for 6 seconds in a 4 tile radius.

object.description: The acorn is the squirrel's favorite snack! Dig into with this delightful treat.\n\nItems contained in Autumn Treasure can only be redeemed until the 16th of November 2021.
A secret stash of 100 000 gold. Contact support to claim it, as they are the only ones to know its location.\n\nCan only be redeemed until the 16th of November 2021.
A secret stash of 15 000 gold. Contact support to claim it, as they are the only ones to know its location.\n\nCan only be redeemed until the 16th of November 2021.
You only have time to grab an ST set before Beisa himself barges in! Contact support to claim it and escape the armory.\n\nCan only be redeemed until the 16th of November 2021.
Said to be a wish-granting mirror, but likely to be cursed. Contact support to claim three skins of choice, and be careful of your wishes.\n\nCan only be redeemed until the 16th of November 2021.
You are the luckiest squirrel in the Realm! Not many have been able to ever set eyes in this golden acorn.\n\nItems contained in Autumn Treasure can only be redeemed until the 16th of November 2021.
A cozy yet refreshing beverage.
While the wax from the candle inside might be considered unhealthy (nevermind the flame), Realm pets seem to love it unconditionally.
An autumn cafe-goer's best friend.
A traditional fare at the Manor of the Immortals, this modified Ambrosia contains a healthy amount of iron.

A mosquito's fare.
Just a sample of an exquisite cocktail. If you're a vampire.
But really, it's mostly made of fruits. Mostly.
A very eerie looking tombstone. Decipher it to find a Halloween Wizard or Necromancer ST item hidden behind it.
The jaws that bite, the claws that catch!
The Lycanthrope, with beastly mane!

effectinfo.description: Fires a moon blast when hit for at least 40 damage.
effectinfo.name: Moon Rage

object.description: Beware the Lycanthrope, my son!
And shun the frumious Man-Wolf-Beast!
When the curious Summoner first laid hands upon this artifact, it emitted a haunting shriek. The terror it stirred within her was enough to predict her demise.
Now fated to perpetuate the Banshee's curse, the Summoner wielded power over lesser spirits.

effectinfo.name: Summon
effectinfo.description: A Terrible Specter, click or hold your Summon Control button to move it.

effectinfo.name: Unbearable Presence
effectinfo.description: The Terrible Specter, unbound from its world, becomes unstable after 5 seconds.

effectinfo.name: Unstable Ectoplasm
effectinfo.description: Shoots 1/2/3/4 paralyzing shots thrice, then explodes for 1000/1100/ 1250/1500 damage in 3/3.5/4/5 squares.
Gets more powerful with more Set Pieces.

object.description: Her robe, once boldly red, was reduced to ghostly tatters.
She would always carry an overpowering desire of revenge upon those that set her on this cursed path. She would pursue them for eternity.
When he heard about the horrifying Banshee at Septavius' side, the Archexorcist set out on his holiest quest yet, wielding an artifact wrested from the very hands of a God.
It takes zealotry bordering on madness to even dare utter the scathing words within this Tome. Its very contents blurred his vision and set his head to spinning. But he would dare.

effectinfo.description: 1% chance to become Drunk for 2 seconds after taking at least 50 damage.
effectinfo.name: Drunk on Righteousness

object.description: He would face this threat wearing his most ceremonial garments.
The origin of the stone in this ring, and its connection to the staff that bore the Banshee's curse: a secret he would carry to his grave.
Lord Ruthven had acquired a veritable monster from who-knows-where. Luckily, her bullets cured lycanthropy.
She had the Archexorcist himself bless this trap. She hoped it would be enough to help catch a miscreation of this size.

effectinfo.description: Trap inflicts Healing and Berserk upon players for 4 seconds.
effectinfo.name: Blessing of the Fanatic

object.description: Of course, a quirk of her... condition was the overwhelming desire to look great.

effectinfo.description: 10% chance to receive +10 dexterity for 5 seconds on taking damage.
effectinfo.name: Hunting Frenzy

object.description: And still, she would not let the Vampire's curse she carried define her. Just as she would go on to rid others of their own curses. With violence, if needed.
A cloak that makes one's skin crawl with the dread of its short-lived former owner.
Tugging the bowstring fiber disrupts a delicate balance between the limbs of this bow, rapidly crystallizing the surrounding frost into a serrated bolt of hail.
Baneful beats of this waist-worn instrument rile the skies, invoking the occluded power of the storm.

Hardly attire of any sort, but rather a sustained cone of latent energy called forth by unseen wind spirits. Stray gusts glide beneath each step, affording both impressive speed and a thrilling lighter-than-air sensation.

effectinfo.name: Superstorm
effectinfo.description: Increases the cast range of Thundering Chorus' Lightning Strike to 10 Tiles

object.description: A breathtaking amulet believed to portend the will of the storm. The large stone within faintly swirls, as though an entire cyclone were somehow petrified by force of the earth.

effectinfo.name: Concussive Waves
effectinfo.description: Grants recursive thunder explosions to the lightning strike of Thunderous Chorus

object.description: Strictly speaking, this is no wand at all, and rather blunt even for a channeling device. Yet its crude appearance belies a sophisticated tool of deterrence, a contrast very much in character for the spirits of the earth.

To fabricate colossi from within the earth is a rare and enviable practice, often deemed sacred. The creations of this club-like mace are too brittle for the interest of certain parties, but the proven potential is a precious thing indeed.

effectinfo.name: Summon
effectinfo.description: Stone Golem, orbits the caster, this summon has 1500 Hp and 20 Def

effectinfo.name: Reflect attack
effectinfo.description: Summons only shoot when they are hit.

object.description: The practices of the earth mages died out with their bloodline, a consequence of notoriously being rather secretive types. But the traits of this garb, hardy and unyielding, tell much of their ways.

effectinfo.name: Earth's Blessing
effectinfo.description: Grants Armored for 5 seconds on ability use when worn with Stonemould Mace

object.description: When etched into stone, this mark greatly amplifies one's resilience, as though it echoes the earth's power. Hollow relics like these are an oddity, as earth shamans regarded the designed permission of flowing air as a sign of severe fault.

effectinfo.name: Runic Stone
effectinfo.description: Increases Stonemould mace summon damage to 800-1200, health to 2000, and defense to 30.

object.description: A standard, lightweight sheath fit for enabling quick draws in a forward dash.
A dependable sheath carved of petrified wood, with a finely curved slot to optimize draw force.
A meticulously crafted sheath built of stretched vines and parallel blades of grass for a smoother blade release.
A curious sheath designed to evoke the effortless flow of clouds and fog.
A fierce sheath made to spill the blood of gods, briefly filling the wielder with a beastly aggression when a blade is drawn.
An elegant teal sheath with masterful snake etchings both inside and out, amplifying the momentum of a swift strike from the hip.
An extravagant gilded sheath which was once the heirloom of a distant clan, a now extinct bloodline whose intricate weapon arts remain in practice.
A marvelous sheath of inimitably brilliant constitution. Drawing one's blade from within emits a furious sonic wave, propelling the weapon beyond its known limits.
A detestably vengeful sheath consumed in the violet flames of Asura, a hateful deity scorned since the time of the ancients.
Archdemon Malphas took a conspicuous liking to this outsider's sheath, smuggled in by a newly demonic soul. Perhaps its design reminded him of something?

effectinfo.name: Explosion
effectinfo.description: 400 base dmg and 50 more dmg for each 5 WIS above 50.

object.description: Still believing himself a monk, Daichi knew an open blade contrasts his superficial rank. Yet he could not bear to abandon his wicked material weapon, and so he forever concealed it with this sheath.

effectinfo.description: Enemies hit by the trail are slowed for 2 seconds.

object.description: The Woodland Labyrinth is a lamentable example of mortal meddling in the ways of nature, a harsh reality its occupants are keenly aware of. A sheath like this, fully embracing their own ways of life, is no doubt a bitter expression of dissent.

A foreign sheath stolen from unknown lands by the crew of Davy Jones. Now phantoms, the headstrong ghost pirates have misused this delicate instrument as a rapier holder, twisting its effects with their chaotic ways.
Believed to be some kind of artificial organ, this sheath embeds the weapon in a solid crystal coating before violently fracturing into shrapnel when drawn.
Swift, ruthless, and a perfect encapsulation of Oryx's militia. Vicious aggression to overwhelm one's enemies has been the Mad God's tactic of choice since the day he earned his title.
An advanced flight test disguised as an arts and crafts project, or so its inventor continues to believe.
A glacial seal consumes any weapon held within, solidifying a layer of permafrost to enable smoother draws with the elegance of falling snow.
In the right hands, this fluid blade lashes out with stinging water whips. Such adept control over the wild waters is thought to be a sign of great achievement for any swordsman.
Masters of swordsmanship recognize how much can be learned from the flow of the ocean's waves.
Reinforced coral creates a form of shock absorbing plates, a crucial trait for surviving the high pressure of the ocean floor.
A keepsake held closely by Thessal, clinging to the unlikely chance of her king's continued wellbeing. Any sailor knows this slim hope is all that contains the true beast of the seas.
It's tasty and it will not ruin your pet's diet!
Some pets go nuts for it.
We have no idea what sort of apples were used to bake this pie, but all the pets seem to love it.
Ah yes, some people just like their solar potatoes mashed.
No actual turkeys were harmed during the making of this cake, they were only used as consultants.

A crate with earthly strength, solid enough to seemingly bend the space around it. Open it to get one of the following:

*Earthen Ward
*Stonemould Mace
*Rocky Robe
*Steadfast Glyph
*Mini Earthen Bulwark Summoner Skin
*Char Slot Unlocker
*Vault Chest Unlocker
*Ambrosia
*Mystery ST Shard x5
*Golden Clover

A crate crackling with the untamed power of the storm. Open it to get one of the following:

*Hailstorm
*Thundering Chorus
*Wind Dancer Robe
*Augur of the Tempest
*Mini Storm Caller Bard Skin
*Char Slot Unlocker
*Vault Chest Unlocker
*Ambrosia
*Mystery ST Shard x5
*Golden Clover

As the plentiful bounty of a flourishing Spring is bestowed upon the Realm, see what her gift to you may be.\n\nItems contained in Spring Treasure can only be redeemed until the 14th of May 2022.
A rare and exquisite flower, found in the wildest reaches of a Realm in the height of Spring.\n\nItems contained in Spring Treasure can only be redeemed until the 14th of May 2022.

Flames dance upon the molten surface of this crate. Open it to get one of the following:

*Fiery Katana
*Pyro Sheath
*Flame Guard
*Firelight Necklace
*Mini Fiery Kensei Skin
*Char Slot Unlocker
*Vault Chest Unlocker
*Ambrosia
*Mystery ST Shard x5
*Golden Clover
A light powerful blade, capable of burning even the toughest opponents.
This sheath can be a great tool in the hands of an experienced Kensei.

effectinfo.name: On Wearing the Full Set
effectinfo.description: Bullets deal 600 damage and travel longer distance

object.description: Made of refractory material, this heavy armor is capable of summoning a powerful creature for extra defense.

effectinfo.name: On Hit
effectinfo.description: Summons a fire lizard for 0.9 seconds

object.description: A beautiful accessory which burns constantly to guide you through battle.
...a driving force, indeed the driving force of nature and of civilization, would drive us once again to...
We sought to ape its astonishing force, to reproduce it in our environment...
...the principle of things that are, Water could take all forms that make up our world, and we harnessed it...
...our Mother and our Essence and our livelihood... we would now seek its full potential.
Within this relic all elements swirl in perfect equilibrium. What would otherwise unleash cataclysmic disaster holds together in immaculate arcane homeostasis. We would surpass it.

effectinfo.name: Fury of Flame and Storm
effectinfo.description: Gain +5 attack and dexterity while attacking if your health is above 90% Max HP

effectinfo.name: Perseverance of Land and Water
effectinfo.description: Gain +5 defense and +15 vitality for 10 seconds when taking damage below 60% Max HP

object.description: And the Great Wave bore upon our dwellings, flushing us and our beasts and our tools... but one remained, and he held aloft his blade, and summoned to himself the powers that still haunted this place.
Our elder would look upon the storms and pondered on how a thing with no substance could leave but desolation in its wake.
What force would do but the very force behind life and movement? No other. This weapon would prove it.
She had read the tomes of other races, and she had the wisdom of the Earth. She saw how we must proceed.
Its pages are slightly damp and little of the ink remains readable after apparent water damage. It was a treatise on Water by an eminent sage, but someone has been scribbling in the margins.

activate.title: Book of Water

object.description: Not many pages remain of this tome. It was a treatise on Air by a famous philosopher, but someone has been using it to seemingly keep records.

activate.title: Book of Air

object.description: Most of this book has burned away. It was a treatise on Fire by an ancient scholar, but some of the text differs.

activate.title: Book of Fire
activate.text:
{i}...no one of gods and men has made this world, but it always was and will be an ever-living fire...

...all that lives and walks upon this earth, animated by the very essence of destruction...

{color=#30647e}...a paradoxical fusion of Flame and...

...the power to alter our existence.{/color}{/i}

object.description: Most of its pages have been damaged or torn away. It was a treatise on Earth by a learned one, but it has been written on again at a later time.

activate.title: Book of Earth

object.description: This experimental device harnesses the power of lightning, allowing you to science your enemies senseless with raw energy.
Slamming this charred iron rod into the ground will summon elemental energies to blast anyone who comes close.
You can barely tell that this dress was taken from a poor bride who was buried in it.

effectinfo.description: Releases 3 damaging sparks (200-275 damage) in a cone.
effectinfo.name: On taking at least 20 damage

object.description: This gigantic wig contains a lot of electrical energy due to being 90% wire wool.
The edge has been made blunt and ragged from smashing into trees, doors, walls, and pesky hikers.
This once held potatoes. Now it can barely hold back his rage.

effectinfo.name: If wearing Headless Ted
effectinfo.description: Gain a 2.5 second Paralysis effect within 4.5 squares on activation.

object.description: The cloth does nothing to soften incoming attacks, but the blows only make the wearer angrier.
The teddy's head is down the well with the others.

object.description: As the nameless monarch sat malcontent upon the throne, his ambitions and impiety became one, and with this came enlightenment. A legacy reduced to less than legend, utterly erased from the nescient minds of the land, with its only epitaph being the sorry remnant of his majesty's dearest. After all, what good are kings in a realm of gods?
